channel.title: 纽约时报-全球
channel.description: 这是一个追踪纽约时报-全球news的种子

item.title: 伊登-戈兰（Eden Golan）将代表以色列参加五月的欧洲电视网。尽管这场盛大的演出并不明显是战争的代言，但加沙冲突似乎将为这场比赛蒙上阴影。
item.description: Eden Golan will represent Israel in Eurovision in May. Though the high-camp spectacle is not an obvious proxy for war, the contest looks set to be overshadowed by the conflict in Gaza. nyti.ms/498zZ9g

item.title: "赛义杜-特拉奥雷说："Lêkê是象牙海岸的国鞋。
item.description: “Lêkê are the national shoes of Ivory Coast,” said Seydou Traoré, his feet resting inside an orange pair. nyti.ms/4bqC8hY

item.title: 在基辅的不确定性加剧之际，俄罗斯向乌克兰各地城市发射了大量导弹和无人机。
item.description: A Russian barrage directed missiles and drones at cities across Ukraine at a moment of heightened uncertainty for Kyiv. nyti.ms/3upeSjE

item.title: "如果有人穿着合适的运动鞋来，我们就会取笑他：'你以为你是职业球员还是什么？伊利亚斯-萨诺戈（Iliass Sanogo）一边说，一边看着一群朋友在朦胧的暮色中踢球，他们都穿着lêkê。
item.description: “Let a guy come with proper sneakers and we’ll make fun of him: ‘You think you’re a professional player or what?’” Iliass Sanogo said as he watched a group of friends — all wearing lêkê — play in the hazy twilight. nyti.ms/4bwS96b

item.title: 英国王位继承人威廉王子在其父查尔斯三世国王宣布罹患癌症两天后，于周三重返公众舞台，试图表现出一种坚毅的平常心。
item.description: Prince William, the heir to the British throne, stepped back onto the public stage Wednesday, trying to project a steely sense of normalcy, two days after the announcement that his father, King Charles III, had been struck by cancer. nyti.ms/3Sz6u9z

item.title: 欧盟委员会表示，它正在就匈牙利最近通过的针对外国人在该国活动的立法启动一项纪律处分程序。
item.description: The European Commission says it is opening a disciplinary procedure against Hungary over recently passed legislation that focuses on the activities of foreigners in the country. nyti.ms/3w9KXN5

item.title: 瑞典结束了对连接俄罗斯和西欧的北溪天然气管道遭受海底袭击事件的调查，理由是缺乏进一步追究责任人的权力。
item.description: Sweden closed an investigation into the undersea attack on the Nord Stream gas pipelines that link Russia to Western Europe, citing a lack of authority to further pursue those responsible. nyti.ms/48aFClI

item.title: 在象牙海岸，一场大型足球比赛吸引了非洲大陆最优秀的球队参加，塑料凉鞋是皮卡游戏和几乎所有其他活动的首选装备。
item.description: In Ivory Coast, where a major soccer tournament has drawn the continent’s best teams, a plastic sandal is the preferred gear for pickup games and almost everything else. nyti.ms/3OyTOOt

item.title: 厄瓜多尔因帮派暴力而不堪重负，与萨尔瓦多一样，已成为军事化镇压的实验室，镇压杀人，但威胁公民自由。
item.description: Ecuador, overwhelmed by gang violence, has, like El Salvador, become a laboratory for a militarized crackdown that suppresses killings but threatens civil liberties. nyti.ms/42D3AFd

item.title: 战争来临时，乌克兰园艺家 Alla Olkhovska 打算开一家珍稀植物苗圃。现在，她的花卉种子，尤其是铁线莲，在国际上享有盛誉。
item.description: When war came to her country, Alla Olkhovska, a Ukrainian gardener, had been planning to open a rare-plants nursery. Now her flower seeds, especially her Clematis, have an international following. nyti.ms/3Uxcy4R

item.title:
多年来，伊拉克一直在设法实现一种不太可能的平衡，允许与美国和伊朗（美国的克星）都有联系的武装部队在其领土上活动。
现在，情况越来越不稳定了。
item.description:
For years, Iraq has managed to pull off an unlikely balancing act, allowing armed forces tied to both the United States and Iran, an American nemesis, to operate on its soil.

Now, things are getting shaky. nyti.ms/3w86mGk

item.title: RT by @nytimesworld：欧盟在乌克兰摊牌几天后与匈牙利开辟新战线
item.description:
EU Opens New Front With Hungary Days After Ukraine Showdown

nytimes.com/2024/02/07/world…

item.title: 巴基斯坦选举办公室外发生两起爆炸事件，造成至少 22 人死亡。
item.description: Two explosions outside election offices in Pakistan killed at least 22 people, officials said, a deadly reminder of the deteriorating security situation in the country as it heads into national elections. nyti.ms/3SM9HDM

item.title: 意大利总理乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）帮助说服匈牙利领导人维克托-欧尔班（Viktor Orban）同意为乌克兰设立一个具有里程碑意义的基金。这对欧洲和她来说都是一个重要时刻。
item.description: Giorgia Meloni, Italy’s prime minister, helped persuade the Hungarian leader, Viktor Orban, to go along with a landmark fund for Ukraine. It was a big moment for Europe, and for her. nyti.ms/3SyeUOt

item.title: 与其他君主相比，查尔斯三世国王让人们更多地了解了他的健康状况，但他对自己所患癌症的保密决定却让人们用猜测代替了事实。
item.description: King Charles III has let people know more about his health than other monarchs, but a decision to keep private the form of cancer he has is leading to speculation in lieu of facts. nyti.ms/3SSJbZK

item.title: 当地官员说，俄罗斯导弹和无人机对乌克兰各地的城市发动了猛烈攻击。这些袭击发生在乌克兰不确定性加剧的时刻。
item.description: A barrage of Russian missiles and drones targeted cities across Ukraine, local officials said. The attacks came at a moment of heightened uncertainty for the country. nyti.ms/4bllLTM

item.title: 美国和卡塔尔官员暗示加沙和谈取得了一些进展，但哈马斯和以色列的立场似乎仍然相去甚远。
item.description: U.S. and Qatari officials hinted at some progress in Gaza peace talks, but the positions of Hamas and Israel appear to remain far apart. nyti.ms/3UvQNT9

item.title: 智利前总统塞巴斯蒂安-皮涅拉（Sebastián Piñera）于周二在直升机坠毁事故中去世。享年 74 岁。
item.description: Sebastián Piñera, un expresidente de Chile que ayudó a fortalecer la joven democracia del país al convertirse en el primer líder conservador tras el fin de la dictadura, murió el martes en un accidente de helicóptero, informó el gobierno. Tenía 74 años. nyti.ms/49t7rHh

item.title: 在以色列一位高级部长重申以色列的地面入侵将扩大到飞地南部的拉法（Rafah）之后，在加沙和埃及边界沿线拥挤的帐篷城中避难的巴勒斯坦人感到恐惧。
item.description: Palestinians sheltering in crowded tent cities along the border between Gaza and Egypt were fearful after a senior Israeli minister reiterated that Israel’s ground invasion would extend to Rafah, in the enclave’s south, which is hosting displaced people. nyti.ms/49pNEZe

item.title: 联合国支持的结束也门九年冲突的进程最近似乎正在向前推进。但随后加沙战争爆发，现在和平的前景正在破灭。
item.description: A United Nations-backed process to end Yemen’s nine-year conflict appeared to be moving forward recently. But then the war in Gaza began, and now the prospect of peace is unraveling. nyti.ms/3OtfwDt

item.title: 以下是国王查理三世的病情及其对英国君主制的影响。
item.description: Here is what to know about the King Charles III’s condition and its implications for Britain’s monarchy. nyti.ms/3vZlKok

item.title: 美国情报显示，莫斯科可能试图帮助平壤进入国际金融体系，以换取导弹和弹药。
item.description: U.S. intelligence suggests that Moscow may be trying to help Pyongyang with access to the international financial system in exchange for missiles and ammunition. nyti.ms/3HNaWw7

Agriculture accounts for 30 percent of global greenhouse emissions.

Reducing it requires making tough choices and facing a potent political lobby: farmers.

A cautionary tale from Europe by @MonikaPronczuk and me:

nytimes.com/2024/02/06/clima…

item.title: 智利政府称，智利前总统塞巴斯蒂安-皮涅拉（Sebastián Piñera）于周二在智利的一次直升机坠毁事故中去世。享年 74 岁。
item.description: Sebastián Piñera, a former president of Chile who helped strengthen the nation’s young democracy after becoming its first conservative leader since a military dictatorship, died in a helicopter crash in Chile on Tuesday, the government said. He was 74. nyti.ms/4bpKIgX

item.title: 海地一名检察官已提起刑事诉讼，指控多人可能是 2021 年暗杀总统约韦内尔-莫伊塞的同谋，其中包括他在袭击中受伤的妻子。
item.description: Un fiscal haitiano ha presentado una denuncia penal en la que nombra a varias personas como posibles conspiradores en el asesinato del presidente Jovenel Moïse en 2021, entre ellas su esposa, quien resultó herida en el atentado. nyti.ms/3OvrJrx

item.title: 前福克斯新闻主持人塔克-卡尔森周二表示，俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京 "很快 "将接受塔克-卡尔森的采访。
item.description: President Vladimir Putin of Russia will “soon” sit for an interview with Tucker Carlson, the former Fox News host said on Tuesday. nyti.ms/3HQsRlO

item.title: 雷杰普-塔伊普-埃尔多安总统在灾后承诺在一年内建造大量新房。但这一诺言只实现了一部分，而追究施工方责任的工作也进展缓慢。
item.description: President Recep Tayyip Erdogan promised in the disaster’s aftermath to build large numbers of new homes in a year. That vow remains only partly fulfilled, and efforts to hold people accountable over faulty constructions are proceeding slowly. nyti.ms/3SsqTwY

item.title: 以色列士兵分享的视频在社交媒体上广为流传，他们在庆祝加沙的房屋和其他民用建筑被摧毁。
item.description: Videos shared by Israeli soldiers celebrating the destruction of what appear to be homes and other civilian buildings in Gaza are circulating widely on social media. nyti.ms/49pUPAm

item.title: 在智利可怕的森林大火中，有四名遇难者来自国家植物园，而植物园本身就是珍稀植物的天堂。
item.description: Entre las víctimas de los terribles incendios forestales de Chile están cuatro personas del jardín botánico nacional, y el propio jardín, un paraíso para las plantas raras. nyti.ms/487NmoT

item.title:
白金汉宫周一宣布，国王查尔斯三世在即位不到 18 个月后被诊断出患有癌症。
以下是他的病情及其对英国君主制的潜在影响。
item.description:
Buckingham Palace announced on Monday that King Charles III had been diagnosed with cancer, less than 18 months after beginning his reign.

Here’s what to know about his condition and its potential implications for Britain’s monarchy. nyti.ms/49op6j5
